name: aperture
description: Record the screen on macOS and Windows

scripts.build: echo "use 'npm run build-macos' or 'npm run build-win'" && exit 1
scripts.build-win: cd Aperture.CLI && msbuild Aperture.CLI.csproj /t:Restore;Build;ILMerge /p:Platform=x86 /p:Configuration=Release && copy Out\Release\x86\net45\aperture.exe ..
